name: generate-secret
title: Generate Secret
description: Generate secure random secrets of various lengths and copy them to your clipboard. Perfect for creating API keys, passwords, and other secure tokens.
author: nyxb

commands.name: generate-secret
commands.title: Generate Secret
commands.subtitle: Generate and copy secure random string
commands.description: Generate cryptographically secure random strings of different lengths (16-128 characters) and automatically copy them to your clipboard.

preferences.name: length
preferences.title: Default Length
preferences.description: Choose the default length of the generated secret

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
